title: John Travolta and Kelly Preston celebrate 28 years of marriage with sweet posts
text:
John Travolta and his wife, fellow actor Kelly Preston, are celebrating 28 years of marriage.

The two penned loving tributes for one another to mark the special wedding anniversary.

"To my dearest Johnny, the most wonderful man I know," Preston's post began. "You have given me hope when I have felt lost, loved me patiently and unconditionally… made me laugh harder than any other human being possible... shared the most beautiful highs and at times lows."

"You’re a dream Daddio and make life so much fun!! I trust my love with you implicitly... with you I know I will always be okay no matter what happens," she continued.

"I love you forever and completely," she added. Travolta commented, "I love you so much Kelly! Thank you for all your love and for being such a wonderful wife and mother."

He also shared another snap from what appeared to be their anniversary dinner.

The couple has three children together, Ella Bleu, 19, Benjamin, 8, and Jett, who died unexpectedly in 2009 at the age of 16.
description: John Travolta and Kelly Preston penned loving tributes for one another to mark the special wedding anniversary.
